However, the second source, canonical rankings from March 1, 2025, lists Blue Harbor as ranked #2 by revenue in 2025.

I don't have enough evidence to say which ranking is accurate. To determine Blue Harbor's revenue rank in 2025, you may want to index more specific documents related to revenue rankings or financial reports for that year.
